top.title: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
top.summary: The couple bows to the House Oversight Committee's demands after arguing for months that its subpoenas were invalid.

top.title: Rape trial begins for son of Norway's crown princess in tense moment for royal family
top.summary: Marius Borg Høiby is accused of 38 charges including four counts of rape in one of the biggest cases in Norway for years.

top.title: After months of acrimony, Colombia's Petro is about to meet Trump
top.summary: Despite some recent cordiality, the Colombian and Americans leaders have long traded barbs and accusations.

top.title: SpaceX to take over Elon Musk's AI firm
top.summary: Musk's space exploration company and his AI start-up are merging.

top.title: China bans hidden car door handles over safety concerns
top.summary: It makes China the first country to stop the use of designs first made popular by Elon Musk's Tesla.

top.title: What is the 'social media network for AI' Moltbook?
top.summary: The Reddit-like website which launched in late January allows AI bots to speak to each other.
